RT @JasonJournoDC: üö®NEW: @elonmusküêº

"What I discovered is it's extremely difficult even to cut very obvious waste and fraud from the gover‚Ä¶

retweet.text:
üö®NEW: @elonmusküêº

"What I discovered is it's extremely difficult even to cut very obvious waste and fraud from the government ‚Äî because the government has to operate on who's complaining."

"If you cut off payments to fraudsters, they immediately come up with the most sympathetic sounding reasons to continue the payment. They don't say, 'Please keep the fraud going.' They‚Äôre like, 'You're killing baby pandas!'

"Meanwhile, there's no baby pandas who are dying. They're just making it up. The fraudsters are capable of coming up with extremely compelling, heart-wrenching stories that are false ‚Äî but nonetheless sound sympathetic. That's what happened."

@DailyCaller

tweets.text: Big upgrade to @CommunityNotes

quoted.text:
We're launching something new: Collaborative Notes

The idea: when you request a note, AI drafts one ‚Äî then the community refines it together through ratings and suggestions. You can watch it get better in real time.

It‚Äôs a whole new way for the public to work with AI ‚Äî and each other ‚Äî to make information more accurate. And a whole new way to contribute to Community Notes.

For now, only requests from Top Writers on English-language posts generate Collaborative Notes, and you must have 2+ Writing Impact to make suggestions. We plan to expand that & shape the experience based on your feedback.

As usual, it‚Äôs open-source: https://t.co/ADsUjbO8wV

user.name: Community Notes
user.description:
Empowering users to create a better-informed world.

We're open source and data is publicly available: https://t.co/Te3IjR10Ix

Q? Reply/DM

tweets.text: For sure

quoted.text:
Corporations that are purely AI and robotics will vastly outperform any corporations that have people in the loop

You can think of it like how 'computer' used to be a job that humans had. You would go and get a job as a computer where you would do calculations. They had entire skyscrapers full of humans....20, 30 floors of humans...just doing calculations. Now, that entire skyscraper of humans doing calculations can be replaced by a laptop with a spreadsheet. That spreadsheet can do vastly more calculations than an entire building full of human computers

So, you think about it: what if only some of the cells in your spreadsheet were calculated by humans? That would be much worse than if all of the cells in your spreadsheet were calculated by the computer. And so, really what will happen is the pure AI, pure robotics corporations or collectives will far outperform any corporations that have humans in the loop. It will happen very quickly

retweet.text: 4 dead. Let into the country via the Biden-Democrat phone app for illegals.

quoted.text:
BREAKING: DHS confirms to @FoxNews that a semi-truck driver arrested for causing a head on crash in Indiana that killed 4 people on Tuesday is a Kygryzstani national who entered the US via the Biden administration's CBP One cell phone app on 12/19/2023 at the Nogales, AZ port of entry, and was released into the US via parole by the Biden admin. 

Police say 30-year-old Bekzhan Beishekeev was driving on SR 67 in Jay County, Indiana when he didn‚Äôt stop for another slowed semi-truck, swerving instead into oncoming traffic and crashing head-on into a van, killing four people, several of whom were reportedly Amish, according to local media. 

ICE records show Beishekeev is now in ICE custody, meaning local law enforcement honored a detainer and already handed him over.

A reminder, the Biden era CBP One cell phone app allowed 50,000 to 60,000 otherwise inadmissible aliens to enter the US legally every month for two year humanitarian parole grants. President Trump terminated the program the day he was inaugurated, and has since turned it into a self deportation app.

More to come on this as we get it.
